channel.title: admin on Simon Kapitza
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Simon Kapitza

item.description: I am a PhD Candidate at the Quantitative & Applied Ecology Group, a diverse and dynamic ecological modelling group at the University of Melbourne. Despite being enrolled in Australia, I have permanently returned to Berlin and successfully continued my work remotely. Since my return, I have also been affiliated with the Macroecology Lab at Potsdam University as research and teaching assistant. I am an interdisciplinary global change ecologist researching interactions between socio-economic and bio- physical drivers of biodiversity change.
